name: VTOL Arcade
description:
This game is about flying a VTOL (vertical take off and landing) in a hostile environment with nothing but lots of rockets and bombs.

WARNING: this is just a prototype with a simple and fairly incomplete demo level.

What to expect:

  • one demo level demonstrating the core gameplay
  • a few enemy units
  • maybe no fun and no challenges at all because nothing is balanced or polished

If you're still interested,
comments and feedback are highly welcome.

Controls

This game is played keyboard only, mouse is not required.

  • WSAD for flying the VTOL
  • Left and Right arrow for rockets
  • Down Arrow for bombs
  • ESC for ingame menu
Platforms

Windows for now, a linux version will follow soon

Installing

Simply use the installer or unpack the zip file
